channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Making Visual Studio a bit more visual】让 Visual Studio 更加直观
item.description: 【Any web, desktop, or mobile developer works with images often. You reference them from C#, HTML, XAML, CSS, C++, VB, TypeScript, and even in code comments. Some images are local, and some exist online or on network shares, while others only exist as base64 encoded strings.】任何 Web、桌面或移动开发人员都经常使用图像。您可以从 C#、HTML、XAML、CSS、C++、VB、TypeScript 甚至代码注释中引用它们。有些图像是本地的，有些存在于在线或网络共享上，而其他图像仅作为 base64 编码字符串存在。

item.title: 【Azure Fluid Relay: Leveraging Azure Blob Storage to scale Git】Azure Fluid Relay：利用 Azure Blob 存储来扩展 Git
item.description: 【Learn how to leverage Git as a storage mechanism behind the globally available Azure Fluid Relay (AFR) service.】了解如何利用 Git 作为全球可用的 Azure Fluid Relay (AFR) 服务背后的存储机制。

item.title: 【.NET 9 Preview 6 is now available!】.NET 9 预览版 6 现已推出！
item.description: 【Try out the latest features in .NET 9 Preview 6 across the .NET runtime, SDK, libraries, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, and more!】跨 .NET 运行时、SDK、库、ASP.NET Core、Blazor 等尝试 .NET 9 Preview 6 中的最新功能！

item.title: 【Creating an already-completed asynchronous activity in C++/WinRT, part 7】在 C++/WinRT 中创建已完成的异步活动，第 7 部分
item.description: 【Implementing the contract directly.】直接履行合同。

item.title: 【Building a Safer Future – How NuGet is Tackling Software Supply Chain Threats】构建更安全的未来 - NuGet 如何应对软件供应链威胁
item.description: 【Despite significant technological progress in addressing complex security threats, the key to preventing the next attack lies in adhering to fundamental security principles. It’s essential to ensure the software ecosystem is secure, focusing on protecting .NET developers who design, build, and maintain the critical software we all use.】尽管在解决复杂的安全威胁方面取得了重大的技术进步，但防止下一次攻击的关键在于坚持基本的安全原则。确保软件生态系统的安全至关重要，重点是保护设计、构建和维护我们都使用的关键软件的 .NET 开发人员。

item.title: 【Get Hands-On with Visual Studio and Azure: Live at Microsoft HQ this August!】亲身体验 Visual Studio 和 Azure：今年 8 月在 Microsoft 总部现场直播！
item.description: 【Visual Studio LIVE! Microsoft HQ 2024 August 5-9 | Microsoft Conference Center, Redmond, WA There’s still time to register, join us, get your questions answered, and bring back a wealth of knowledge and excitement to your teams! We’re close to selling out for next month’s conference,】视觉工作室上线！ Microsoft 总部 2024 年 8 月 5 日至 9 日 |华盛顿州雷德蒙德 Microsoft 会议中心 现在还有时间注册、加入我们、解答您的问题并为您的团队带回丰富的知识和兴奋！下个月的会议门票即将售完，

item.title: 【Model as a Service (MaaS) Available for Semantic Kernel】可用于语义内核的模型即服务 (MaaS)
item.description: 【Hello! We are delighted to make an announcement regarding the availability of Azure AI Inference within Semantic Kernel (Python). This latest AI connector empowers you to experiment with a broader range of models hosted on Azure within your applications.   The Sample Application: Evaluating LLMs Here is the location of the full sample.】你好！我们很高兴地宣布有关语义内核 (Python) 中 Azure AI 推理的可用性。这个最新的 AI 连接器使您能够在应用程序中试验 Azure 上托管的更广泛的模型。 示例应用程序：评估法学硕士 这里是完整示例的位置。

item.title: 【NuGetAudit 2.0: Elevating Security and Trust in Package Management】NuGetAudit 2.0：提升包管理的安全性和信任度
item.description: 【Introduction In November 2023 (NuGet 6.8, Visual Studio 17.8, .NET SDK 8.0.100), we released NuGet Audit. NuGet Audit provides warnings during restore when a package with a known vulnerability is used by a project. More information about NuGet Audit, including detailed configuration options can be found on our learn website.】简介 2023 年 11 月（NuGet 6.8、Visual Studio 17.8、.NET SDK 8.0.100），我们发布了 NuGet Audit。当项目使用具有已知漏洞的包时，NuGet Audit 会在还原期间提供警告。有关 NuGet Audit 的更多信息（包括详细的配置选项）可以在我们的学习网站上找到。

item.title: 【Creating an already-completed asynchronous activity in C++/WinRT, part 6】在 C++/WinRT 中创建已完成的异步活动，第 6 部分
item.description: 【Let the conversion do the talking.】让转换来说话。

item.title: 【Building React Native for Windows Apps from a Mac】从 Mac 构建 React Native for Windows 应用程序
item.description: 【Owning a Windows PC is not a requirement to build and ship Windows experiences. In this blog post, I'll walk through my investigation of how to develop React Native for Windows applications from a Mac.】拥有 Windows PC 并不是构建和交付 Windows 体验的必要条件。在这篇博文中，我将逐步研究如何从 Mac 开发适用于 Windows 应用程序的 React Native。
